name: Sky Walk
description:
You're in the sky. Why? We don't know, but there's a path ahead of you with pitfalls.

A unique 2.5D endless game which will keep you playing for hours.

Features:
- fab 3D graphics - beauty in simplicity
- addictive game-play
- infinite runner
- what's your highest score
- unlock new characters
- nice sound effects
- great action, arcade game
